title: is this Bold Sans Outline?
content:
is this Bold Sans Outline? and if so is it for sale anywhere. if not it does seem close to gill sans standard shadowed.

does anyone have a better suggestion for a comparable font?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1111.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205035121/http:/typophile.com/files/1111.jpg) | 10.06 KB |

 [‹ Typewriter-ish](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205035121/http:/typophile.com/node/43666 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for LuzSans ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205035121/http:/typophile.com/node/43643 "Go to next forum topic")
author: tomass

comments.content:
It could be Bureau Grotesque 2 that has been outlined and shadowed. Probably a number of other fonts would also be similar when styled that way.

- Mike Yanega

It seems [Bureau Grot](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205035121/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Bureau+Grot&sample_text=LE%20PETIT%20DEJEUNER) is the way to refer to these now. One of the condensed versions ought to be pretty close. the R tail and J hook are almost the only earmarks here.

- Mike Yanega
